job_description:
Worthington Enterprises is a leading company recognized as one of the Top Workplaces in Columbus. They are seeking a New Product Development Engineering Intern for Summer 2026 to gain hands-on experience in product development and innovation within the Building Products Innovation Team.


Responsibilities

  • Perform hands-on mechanical experiments in a laboratory environment
  • Perform reviews of scientific or industry literature
  • Research and report back on developments in strategic technology areas, manufacturing techniques, and potential vendors
  • Reverse engineer competitive products, patents, and technology
  • Plan & develop new test methods or procedures with safety in mind
  • Collect test data, analyze test results, create written test reports
  • Coordinate product testing with external testing firms or laboratories when a specific test requires outside help
  • Participate in new product design reviews and brainstorming sessions
  • Design test fixtures, specimens, or prototypes using SolidWorks 2023 (2D drawings, 3D parts, & 3D assemblies)
  • Participate in consumer insight activities with customers, end users, or industry experts

Skills

  • Current junior or senior working towards a B.S. in Mechanical Engineering (or related field)
  • Must be able to lift 50lbs
  • Must have reliable transportation; Mid-workday travel between laboratory location & corporate office location is required (3 miles), once daily maximum
  • Prior experience performing research of available literature
  • Mechanical inclination and interest in hands-on problem solving, prototyping, and testing
  • Prior experience safely using hand tools required
  • Minimum of 3.0 GPA
  • Able to communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical audiences
  • Capable of handling multiple assignments at once
  • Able and interested in independent problem solving with moderate direction
  • 2D & 3D CAD software experience (SolidWorks preferred)
  • Prior engineering intern/coop experience required
  • 2D & 3D CAD software experience (SolidWorks preferred)

Company Overview

  • Worthington Enterprises designs and manufactures building products and offers sustainable energy solutions. It was founded in 1955, and is headquartered in Columbus, Ohio, USA, with a workforce of 5001-10000 employees. Its website is https://www.worthingtonenterprises.com/.

    • Company H1B Sponsorship

  • Worthington Enterprises has a track record of offering H1B sponsorships, with 2 in 2025, 2 in 2024. Please note that this does not guarantee sponsorship for this specific role.
